# Patterns Documentation for common design patterns and anti-patterns in Vista applications. ## Pattern Topics - [Common Patterns](/wiki/shared/patterns/common-patterns/) - Reusable patterns - [Anti-Patterns](/wiki/shared/patterns/anti-patterns/) - What to avoid ## Common Patterns - Component composition - State management patterns - Event handling patterns - Layout patterns ## See Also - [Styles](/wiki/shared/styles/) - Styling patterns - [Migration](/wiki/shared/migration/) - Migration patterns
